attributes.action: Give Phil Scratton a knighthood for his work on the Hilsborough truth campaign
attributes.background: Mr Scraton worked tirelessly to get the truth out about Hillsborough he has fpught for truth and justice and was instrumental in the independent panels findings

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
